mapper.insert: insert into task (id, item_id, user_id, name, status, priority, super_id, mark_id, start_time, end_time, completion_time, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{itemId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{superId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{markId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{completionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select id, item_id, user_id, name, status, priority, super_id, mark_id, start_time, end_time, completion_time, create_time, update_time from task where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, item_id, user_id, name, status, priority, super_id, mark_id, start_time, end_time, completion_time, create_time, update_time from task
select id, item_id, user_id, name, status, priority, super_id, mark_id, start_time, end_time, completion_time, create_time, update_time from task where item_id = #{itemId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, item_id, user_id, name, status, priority, super_id, mark_id, start_time, end_time, completion_time, create_time, update_time from task where founder_id = #{founderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, item_id, user_id, name, status, priority, super_id, mark_id, start_time, end_time, completion_time, create_time, update_time from task where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, item_id, user_id, name, status, priority, super_id, mark_id, start_time, end_time, completion_time, create_time, update_time from task where super_id = #{superId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
